data.text: - Bruce Lee's personal abdominal ab workout.

data.text: and if your core's not strong enough,

data.text: So the whole idea behind the ab workout is to engage

data.text: these core muscles in what you do on a day-to-day basis.

translation.text: những cơ bắp cốt lõi trong những gì bạn làm hàng ngày.
